database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Alkylation Damage by Lipid Electrophiles Targets Functional Protein Systems
entry.description:
These data correspond to "Alkylation Damage by Lipid Electrophiles Targets Functional Protein Systems," a paper from Codreanu, Liebler, et al, published at the journal _Molecular and Cellular Proteomics_ in 2013.
Modifications also include: 4-hydroxynonenal (HNE) (UniMod #53), H(16) C(9) O(2), Monoisotopic mass 156.115030 4-Oxononenal (ONE) (UniMod #721), H(14) C(9) O(2), Monoisotopic mass 154.099380 Modifications may be observed in both reduced and oxidized forms (a mass shift of two Da).
